Package ooga.view

Class GameSceneFactory

java.lang.Object
ooga.view.GameSceneFactory
public class GameSceneFactory
extends java.lang.Object
Creates GameScene subclasses, however returns the general GameScene object rather than the concrete subclass.

    • GameSceneFactory

  • Method Details

    • makeScene

      public GameScene makeScene​(java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
      Creates a GameScene with a ResourceBundle that holds information about the scene being created. The resource bundle must include the filename of an FXML file, as the scene is created using the FXML as root.
      Parameters:
      resources - a ResourceBundle for this scene

    • makeScene

      public GameScene makeScene​(java.lang.String sceneName)
      Creates a GameScene using the String name of a resources file.
      Parameters:
      sceneName - name of the GameScene to instantiate, must match a data file name.
      Returns:
      a GameScene subclass

    • setSceneSize

      private void setSceneSize​(int width, int height)
      Sets the scene to the desired width and height
      Parameters:
      width - desired width of scene
      height - desired height of scene
